subject: Re: Junit Testcase help
msgSnippet: These articles might be helpful as well: http://blog.schauderhaft.de/2011/03/13/testing-databases-with-junit-and-hibernate-part-1-one-to-rule-them/
messageBody:
These articles might be helpful as well:

http://blog.schauderhaft.de/2011/03/13/testing-databases-with-junit-and-hibernate-part-1-one-to-rule-them/

http://blog.schauderhaft.de/2011/03/20/testing-databases-with-junit-and-hibernate-part-2-the-mother-of-all-things/

http://blog.schauderhaft.de/2011/03/27/testing-databases-with-junit-and-hibernate-part-3-cleaning-up-and-further-ideas/

They do use hibernate, but the principles still apply independently of your way to interface with the database

kind regards
Jens
